website_summaries.verdict: Durable leather high-cut combat boots for women. Offers versatility in use and comfort. Great for work or leisure.
pros: Lined with soft faux fur for additional cushioning
The top of the boot can be folded down to show a beige sock-like fabric
cons: Some customers found they lacked support

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: As someone said they look like Lara Croft boots. It’s true. They’re very well made. They warm enough for I think 20F below zero. My regular size is 7. This boots are a little bit bigger, just a little bit. But I also have very skinny feet. You can wear warm socks with these boots and you’ll be fine. They are snug, don’t expect them to be as soft as your slippers or memory foam, they aren’t. It’s caterpillar so they hard, they solid, that’s why they are combat boots. I’m very happy with my purchase, that’s what I’ve been looking for. The price is awesome and the quality as well!
customer_reviews.author: D.N.Top Contributor: Cross-Stitch

customer_reviews.title: I love!
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots! I have huge calves and these now fit perfect after a bit of stretching. I would go with the actual size you wear because they fit true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Kish

customer_reviews.title: LOVE These Boots!
customer_reviews.text: First off all, I live in Wisconsin. These boots were purchased to keep my feet warm during cold winters, but also are providing a high level of durability. They're comfortable and warm, I wear them every day and have gotten many compliments on them. I would order them again for sure, but as its panning out I probably won't need new boots for a long time. I did find that they were a little larger than expected, but I returned the first order and got the next size down to me within days with a very speedy refund. Couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great, Terrible Support
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of these boots, but there is no support. I've ordered some insoles, so I hope that helps out. I also really wish they had half sizes because I had to order up and they are a little loose. Also, don't forget to buy some spray to weather proof them. Update- the insoles did not help and these boots KILL my feet. I hate to send them back, but I must.
customer_reviews.author: CzechNovots

customer_reviews.title: Great boot! Toe box is a little large.
customer_reviews.text: I love them! They are pretty stiff, with a lot of extra toe room. So take time breaking them in like most leather boots. Wearing them out of the box for a week straight out of the box isn’t the best idea. For some reason the right boot dug into my ankle when I was breaking them in, but that seems to have improved. The arch support isn't that great, but works for me. I oiled mine, which improved the color since it was a little dull(and waterproofing as a bonus). They also held up well on a camping trip! They’re a little scuffed up now, but it’s expected.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Gill

customer_reviews.title: Caterpillar Alexa boots - not very thrilled
customer_reviews.text: When I ordered these boots, I returned them on the same day. I put my foot in the first one and there seemed to be a piece of plastic sticking into my heel which did not work for me. The size was fine, im normally a size 9 in other shoes but ordered a 9.5 in these. 4/10, would not purchase and would not recommend. I wanted sturdy boots and did not find them in these, but these are really cute!
customer_reviews.author: epb2678

customer_reviews.title: Very Versatile! Awesome REAL Leather Boots!
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots. They are very comfy and warm with good grip. I haven't worn them in deep snow yet, so I can't say anything towards if they are waterproof or not, but I love the fit and versatility. They do run a bit large. I am normally an 11 and they are a bit big, I ordered the 10 and those fit perfectly, but ultimately opted to keep the 11 so I can wear winter socks with them (the 10 would be too snug).
customer_reviews.author: UrbaniteSocialite

customer_reviews.title: Love these boots, large toe box
customer_reviews.text: Just the boots I was looking for; rugged looking, yet not too Manish to pair with any outfit. Edit 11/11/18: Wore these to a camping festival and man, I walked miles in these. The first night into the next morning it rained, yet the inside of the boots remained bone dry. Am going to call these best boots ever😍
customer_reviews.author: CostelloAndBass

customer_reviews.title: Vert comfortable and I love that they have no buckles
customer_reviews.text: Vert comfortable and I love that they have no buckles, tags, embellishments of any kind. All leather, top quality. They look like they're smaller than they are which is always a bonus. I wear a nine and when I opened the box I thought for sure they were going to be tiny because they looked like a size 8 but they were quite roomy. Good solid boot.
customer_reviews.author: Peg

customer_reviews.title: Cute but rugged!
customer_reviews.text: I had been eyeing these boots on Caterpillar's website for months, then they took them off, but I found them here and was thrilled! I love the look, they are cute but rugged. I wore them shoveling after a snowstorm and they didn't soak through at all. My only concern is that they are a bit tight around my calf but I think they will loosen up the more I wear them. Overall I LOVE them!
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy shoe, but....
customer_reviews.text: the color was as described, but I didn't like or expect the shape of the front to look so different. It was kinda box-like in shape, and, although the fit was perfect in length, there was soooo much room in the front of the shoe between my toes and the roof of the shoe. A smaller sizer size would not have solved that problem because I couldn't fit the length. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Viclamm

customer_reviews.title: Love them, might get a different color.
customer_reviews.text: I got the green color. I wore these for a week straight in Alaska and I have no complaints. I also bought the Crep Protect spray which I think is a must for any shoes of this texture. The boots are comfortable, stylish, and versatile. I wore them flaps down with skinny jeans and flaps up under boot cut. It wasn't very cold up there, but my feet stayed warm without overheating. 5 stars all around!
customer_reviews.author: OctoberRose

customer_reviews.title: All set for colder weather!
customer_reviews.text: It's been in the 80s so I haven't had a chance to wear them extensively except when they first arrived! I was nervous about the size because I wear a half size, but in boots, I tend to get a half size larger just in case of thick socks. These fit great! I can wear thick or thin socks, and these boots are "magical". They seem to fit great no matter what! Love them!!
customer_reviews.author: seaside20

customer_reviews.title: Great Caterpillar Quality
customer_reviews.text: I love how Caterpillar boots fit. These have a roomy footbed that accommodates my arch support insert with no compromise. The top of the boot can be folded down to show a beige sock-like fabric. The boots are not super heavy so they don't tire you out wearing them all day. Caterpillar quality is excellent - these are terrific boots and I recommend them for both work and leisure.
customer_reviews.author: Alice Marsupi

customer_reviews.title: Defective Boot Right Out of the Box
customer_reviews.text: I think I'm done buying boots of any kind from Amazon, tbh. This is the second pair IN A ROW I've had an issue with. These were literally BRAND NEW in the box, but the grommet for the top lace is warped/not put on properly, so you can't even unlace the boots to put them on. SUPER disappointed this made it through quality control check, was looking forward to wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: Will Walker

customer_reviews.title: Happy feet.
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots so much. I took note of other reviews that stated how big a fit these boots have. I am a 7.5 to 8 and ordered the 8. I anticipated wearing them with bulky socks and even then there is plenty of room, which is perfect. I inserted a generic orthotic in the bed (again, still no cramped feet) because I’ve spent 4 days walking around the city in the rain and I may be tired but my feet feel great. Did I say I loved these boots yet? I am now going to figure out a way to wear these boots to the office as much as possible
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: I love love love these boots
customer_reviews.text: I love love love these boots!!! In fact, after receiving them and wearing them for a few weeks I ordered a second pair because when these are old and worn out, I will still want to wear them. The fit is great. There was no break in period. I love them. My only regret is that i didn't order other colors the first time. When making the second purchase there was only one color available in my size.
customer_reviews.author: Just a buyer

customer_reviews.title: I would have loved them and ordered my correct size if they did ...
customer_reviews.text: I the style but they were to small. IMO the boot fits as expected. I read reviews and went a half size down and I should have just stuck with my normal size. I would have loved them and ordered my correct size if they did not have the sweater top and fur in the boot. Just a normal leather boot for me and the toe seemed a little shallow but that could have been because the boot was just too small.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Picky

customer_reviews.title: To big!
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with how these boots fit. I looked long and hard to find a pair of boots that looked the way I wanted. I bought my true size 9 that I rarely have an issue with except some sandles. I am still sooo disappointed that these boots are too big when I mean big I mean uncomfortable and gives me blisters even if I wear 3 pairs of socks. Never again will I buy shoes online.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. I am in between a 9 and 9.5 with a slightly wide foot and large calf. these were huge! Stiff leather. And where ankle meets foot they are so roomy that is looked and felt wrong. And you couldn't get the laces tight enough to snug it up. Quality wasn't that bad. Just didn't work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene Grasso

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I was wanting leather boots to hold up to the elements and I think these will. They have a suede texture but haven't marked in the spots that have gotten wet. Love the color. They are a medium gray with an olive tint to them. They fit perfectly. I have thicker ankles and calves, so I'd be hard pressed to lace them all the way up, but why would I want to with the super cute folded look.
customer_reviews.author: asweet

customer_reviews.title: now I have all 3 colors and absolutely love them. I even wear them with dresses and ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd pair of the Alexi, now I have all 3 colors and absolutely love them. I even wear them with dresses and shorts well worth the price and I might add I paid more for my other ones. And they arrived before they were suppose to.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Christenberry

customer_reviews.title: I got these boots today and they look awesome. I tried them on and didn’t want to ...
customer_reviews.text: I got these boots today and they look awesome. I tried them on and didn’t want to take them off. I am usually a size 7 and these fit me true to size. I have enough room for some thicker socks if needed. They shipped fast and in good condition. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: R. B. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: I always wear a size 8 so that is what I purchased and they fit perfect. I walked around in them all day and had no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hold up well against Roosters
customer_reviews.text: Love these, they keep my feet warm. I usually wear them when I run outside to check on my chickens, and the material is really durable! They hold up nicely against Rooster attacks. Not even a scratch on them
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Order half size down
customer_reviews.text: Love this boot. I am a size 8 but felt they were too big. Ordered a 7.5 and they fit perfect. They are not heavy and are stylish. Preferred these over Harley Davidson boots for riding.
customer_reviews.author: AM

customer_reviews.title: Great boots!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome boots! They are comfy and stylish. The sweater top on them is subtle yet cute and they are comfortable and warm. Just what I needed for a cold Chicago winter. I do believe they run a half size larger. I usually wear an 8 and found that they were a little too big. If I wear multiple socks though it helps but it's not necessary because they are comfortable evening being a little too big
customer_reviews.author: kells

customer_reviews.title: love these!
customer_reviews.text: Love that I can comfortably wear good boot socks with these. I normally wear a 9, had about 1/2 " play in the end. Not heavy or clunky. Was worried when I first put them on that I would need inserts because they were flat, but the more I wear them, I notice they are forming to my feet. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Nice style but I felt they were way to loose ...
customer_reviews.text: I returned it. Nice style but I felt they were way to loose inside, my foot kept moving everywhere. They might not be true to size so you may need to downsize or put on thick socks...either way, not for me.
customer_reviews.author: Chica Lee

customer_reviews.title: Love Em!
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots! wish I'd got them one size smaller but there still comfortable and they look amazing and so far have been very durable.
customer_reviews.author: 'Nique

customer_reviews.title: Nice leather, Rigid toe box but Comfy
customer_reviews.text: These were a beautiful color and awesome leather but are awkwardly wide looking. Lots of room in the toe box. Very rigid, would take awhile to break in. Very comfortable as all of Caterpillars boots are.
customer_reviews.author: Mojo

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable boots! Love that there is toe room and they are pretty warm. I wear a size 10 and I hate when the toes are a little to snug. These are great. Only dislike is they were a pain to get on at first....needed a little stretch out and get the laces pulled back some.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well-made and attractive
customer_reviews.text: Good quality boot, comfortable and well made. Is a little on the big side but not to significantly. Only issue is that they do take extra time to get on and off because they have laces only and no zippers.
customer_reviews.author: AHansen

customer_reviews.title: Love these boots and I always get compliments
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots and I always get compliments. They are so comfortable, I wear them all day long and my feet are happy. I plan to get some different colors next fall.
customer_reviews.author: Angelika Zamfirescu

customer_reviews.title: Shape/form of shoes different from each other
customer_reviews.text: One shoe's shape/form differs from the other. Think they sell rejects!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shoes are nice but they aren't accurate in size.
customer_reviews.text: The shoelaces weren't the same length. I will probably have to buy a set because the right shoe laces doesn't even lace all the way up to the last set of holes. And the left shoe fits fine, where's as the right shoe is slightly smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Jazmin

customer_reviews.title: I like how they run larger so I can add arch ...
customer_reviews.text: I like how they run larger so I can add arch supports, otherwise these boots are too flat for me. These boots are cool with leggings!
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: They are a perfect fit and though they are not completely waterproof they ...
customer_reviews.text: I wear these everywhere. They are a perfect fit and though they are not completely waterproof they can be worn in all sorts of weather. The color is more grey than the picture shows.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqui Rose

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING !!!!
customer_reviews.text: I like all CAT product, & this one was one of the best to me.
customer_reviews.author: Ruaida Farhat

customer_reviews.title: My favorite boots! I love the two styles you can ...
customer_reviews.text: My favorite boots! I love the two styles you can wear it, and the toe box is wide enough for my bunions.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: but love the shoes
customer_reviews.text: runs a little bit, but love the shoes! they look great in person
customer_reviews.author: Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: I love these but I had to exchange them for a half size smaller because they ran big but the smaller ones are perfect and so comfy!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Black
customer_reviews.text: A little bulky looking but still very nice appearance. I wear 9 or 9 1/2. 9 1/2 was hard to get on but fit. No pull tab which for time saving by not having to totally unlace and relace. Pretty boot tho.
customer_reviews.author: eYe

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Only wore these a few times in 2017 but didn't put them on this year. Not comfortable and overpriced.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Love these the picture looks much more brown than in person they are slightly worn brown and the fabric around the top is much more chunky than I would like.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: My daughter likes them has to order a size smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe, good quality and comfortable boots at an affordable price.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair. I love these boots, they are comfortable and look great with most casual outfits. I sized down 1/2 from 8.5 to 8 because they run a little big. The 8 are roomy enough!!
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Look great
customer_reviews.text: Hadn’t worn them yet, but they look great and seems like they use quality materials. Going to get some inserts for added comfort.
customer_reviews.author: snobbster

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: ORDER 1 size down from your normal size. I usually wear size 10 and size 9 fit perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Jillian

customer_reviews.title: Holds up great
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my girlfriend and she loves them. She says they hold up better than any boot shes owned, they're good in the snow as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This boot is so cute and nicely made. New favorite!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Glenn

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Look great with my tactical camo ammo pants and true to size. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: TaylorJoel

customer_reviews.title: Awesome boots!
customer_reviews.text: I love this CAT line of boots. I have a pair from a few years ago that I still have and still wear. And they have traipsed around Ireland twice, along with being worn almost daily at home. The fit is perfect for my wide foot. Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Orend

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice boots. Order your exact size, not up or down. Runs perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer#1

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and durable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and durable. More insulated then I expected which is great. My only disappointment is it is much more grey vs taupe then the picture depicted, but since it was called grey suede I suppose I should've expected it. Definitely would buy them again. Perfect casual winter boot.
customer_reviews.author: Laurisa Webster

customer_reviews.title: Not a comfortable boot, thick socks help
customer_reviews.text: Too big, exchanged for one size smaller. Not a comfortable boot, thick socks help.
customer_reviews.author: Hello, my name is: n’t written here.

customer_reviews.title: Large fit...heavy
customer_reviews.text: These boots look great but they are very heavy and fit large otherwise 5 stars for looks!
customer_reviews.author: JPowell

customer_reviews.title: Awesome everyday boots.
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots to death already. A bit big, but I suspect that’s so you can wear thicker socks with it.
customer_reviews.author: Meg :T

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!! Nice fur inside &suede type material on ...
customer_reviews.text: LOVE!! Nice fur inside &suede type material on tongue. Very comfortable & look cool. I am a 9.5/10, I ordered 9.5 and still have quite a bit of room.
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: Affordable, warm , comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots. I have purchased two pairs. They are super comfortable, stylish and affordable !
customer_reviews.author: Sasha mays

customer_reviews.title: I thought I'd love these boots but they were HUGE and a bit ...
customer_reviews.text: I thought I'd love these boots but they were HUGE and a bit to manly for me. I already have big feet, and these looked like clown shoes around the toe. I ended up getting & keeping the Caterpillar Women's Narcissa Combat Boots instead.
customer_reviews.author: LEC

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! I love these
customer_reviews.text: Warm inside, great quality, solid boot. Will be perfect for the snow and cold weather.
customer_reviews.author: Breanne Palcisko

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable and cute
customer_reviews.text: I have narrow feet and always fit a size 9 shoe. These boots fit well but have a little extra space in the toe area. Super comfortable and cute!
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: great boots
customer_reviews.text: To long to get the boots. did not get when told. did come 2 days later. they are great.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Salzer

customer_reviews.title: Size down for thin socks.
customer_reviews.text: I really like these boots, they are good quality work boots without pomp and circumstance. I'm actually glad they showed up somewhat larger as I wear them with thicker socks. Typically I wear an 8.5.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They arrived super fast, and they turned out better than expected
customer_reviews.text: They arrived super fast, and they turned out better than expected, not too small, not too big, just perfect...can work all day in them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good pair of inexpensive boots. Pretty good in snow!
customer_reviews.text: Comfy and pretty good traction in the snow we just had. Surprisingly good for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Fae Verte

customer_reviews.title: I got an 8 as I go up one size for thicker socks and that worked perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Cute boot. I got an 8 as I go up one size for thicker socks and that worked perfect!
customer_reviews.author: New England Girl

customer_reviews.title: Great books!
customer_reviews.text: I really really love theses boots! The cooler is great and they are super comfy so far.
customer_reviews.author: KC Dean

customer_reviews.title: These boots are pretty nice. They're of quality materials and look beautiful
customer_reviews.text: These boots are pretty nice. They're of quality materials and look beautiful. I had some trouble breaking in the backs of them, and got a few light blisters on my heels, but they softened up after a few days of wearing them. They're great now.
customer_reviews.author: Fallon Benz

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and cute
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and cute. The first site I saw them on did not have half sizes which was really disappointing. I'm glad I checked elsewhere
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Iwanski

customer_reviews.title: The cut feels more like a man's shoe
customer_reviews.text: Very fashionable, but I would order at least a half size down. The boots are large and wide. The cut feels more like a man's shoe. I felt like I had on my husband's boots when I tried them on. They would work if really heavy socks were worn. The leather is really nice, and they seem to be well constructed.
customer_reviews.author: Suggie

customer_reviews.title: They were for my 15 yr old, she loves ...
customer_reviews.text: They were for my 15 yr old, she loves them, but just a tad to big
customer_reviews.author: Yazminn Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Great boots!
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots! I ordered an 8.5 and they are a little bit big but it's perfect to put a nice thick sock in. I would not have gone any smaller. Super warm and really good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Look good. Wish it lasted longer
customer_reviews.text: They're good boots. Very comfy and look great with pretty much anything. Sadly, few months in the top started frailing away. By now it's a hole. I hoped to have them for more than just one season. Disappointed. I really liked them
customer_reviews.author: Riaana green

customer_reviews.title: My daughter needed them for EMT school. I didn't ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter needed them for EMT school. I didn't order a size bigger even though many seemed they were small the leather will stretch. She has no complaints so far. They are hard to get on right now but they won't be a month from now.
customer_reviews.author: Nursedana

customer_reviews.title: Soooo comfy!
customer_reviews.text: They were really roomy at first but then I realized the space is perfect because I can put a full sized workers insole in and it would fit perfectly. Voila that did the trick and they are soooo comfy. Definitely worth the price I paid. The only thing I didn't like was it didn't have a zipper on the side so installed one myself. All in all a great purchase
customer_reviews.author: Leather enthusiast

customer_reviews.title: Not What She Expected
customer_reviews.text: Daughter chose these and then didn't like them after she received them. She said they were hard to get in and looked too much like work boots. Sorry, but they will have to be returned.
customer_reviews.author: Juani

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable! I did order half a size smaller than ...
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable! I did order half a size smaller than what I usually wear based on reviews that the boots run big and am very happy with how they fit. Love these boots!!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle N. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered size 8, they were a little big, but it's ok, sometimes I use doble socks. I like them a lot, good quality, work perfect! And resist water.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Came with damage in the knitted top portion right out of the box. Narrow.
customer_reviews.author: ADE

customer_reviews.title: but they look good and feel substantial
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had a chance to wear these out in the elements, but they look good and feel substantial. The boots fit best with an added insole.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Rubesch

customer_reviews.title: Great boot!
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots! They fit true to size and they are very cute and durable in the cold weather
customer_reviews.author: brendagal

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful boots
customer_reviews.text: The boots were beautiful, but they were way to small for me
customer_reviews.author: Camila Ramirez
